review: Best investment made this year... will probably ditch my cable provider
author: J. Pegues "JCP"

review: Love my fire tv!!!  I have bought 3 of them. I love the Amazon Prime Video!! Would suggest Amazon Prime for everyone!!
author: Eloise Turner

review: Simple and intuitive user interfaceGreat content
author: Andy D

review: Too many selections are required to rent...advertising makes it look like most are free to watch
author: Janet Stutzman

review: Love the search by voice. Have found some shows I like on Amazon Prime to watch for free that were not available on Netflix e.g. Suits
author: D. Noble "ToyLover55"

review: It's fast, and the voice command works well.
author: macpack2

review: Gave as a gift to a friend, loves it.
author: Vivian Glickman

review: I am totally satisfied with my purchase of the Amazon Fire TV. It is all that I expected it to be and more. Setup of the product was very easy and didn't take a long time to do it. I am still exploring the different addons it has and considering which streaming sites to add to the Fire TV. I like the TV so much that I have told my relatives and friends about it and they are now considering purchasing one for themselves
author: Leonard Thomas

review: I really like it , it's nice a little and very easy to work
author: Alexis Padilla
